title: Too Many Tokens - Online
description:
You don't need this and Too-Many-Tokens-DND. This is smaller file size, Too-Many-Tokens-DND is usable with normal wildcards

Introducing the Online Too-Many-Tokens Module, your gateway to an extensive collection of over 16,000 tokens meticulously curated for monsters below CR 10 from the Monster Manual. Designed to seamlessly integrate into any system, this module offers unparalleled versatility for your virtual tabletop experience.

Explore a vast array of tokens tailored to your needs, accessible at your fingertips through our dedicated website: TooManyTokens.com.

Key Features:

  • Macro Functionality: Effortlessly apply a plethora of tokens to your selected assets using a user-friendly macro interface.
  • Versatile Usage: Whether you're running Dungeons & Dragons, Pathfinder, or any other system, these tokens are ready for action.

Not sure if this module or Too-Many-Tokens-DND is right for you? Here's a quick breakdown:

Pros:

  • Compact File Size: Occupying less than 1MB of space, this module is ideal for users with storage constraints or utilizing hosting platforms like Forge.
  • Unified Collection: Future updates will seamlessly incorporate Too-Many-Tokens-PF content, ensuring a comprehensive token library.

Cons:

  • Manual Application: Unlike Too-Many-Tokens-DND, this module does not support automatic wildcard application for drag-and-drop token placement. Instead, you'll need to rerun the macro for each new token.
  • Online Dependency: As tokens are hosted externally, an internet connection is required for access.

Discover the limitless possibilities with the Online Too-Many-Tokens Module and elevate your virtual tabletop adventures to new heights.
